documents.document: My belly just made the EXACT noise as when Mario dies. No more Sprite for me.
@lulamorashi and I have started The Tony Club, a pod looking at the Best Play and Best Musical of every Tony awards: https://t.co/2ij4yxuErb
If you want to chew over a great mystery pod, you can't go wrong with @HomecomingShow. Also excellent contribution to the Schwimmerssance.
So... Dev Patel was looking up Star Wars and EverQuest 2 plots? I'll give you a hint for free, you're not going toâ€¦ https://t.co/bQWPuKJNte
@jamescain92 Perhaps it's a celebrity thing. Ripley fam so selfish. Go home, put your feet up. Jeez.
@jamescain92 Or why her and her family decide to stay around these aliens. Some people just will never like you. Accept it.
Alien: Isolation is an excellent game but I'll never understand why Ripley makes SO MUCH NOISE when going to hide in a locker.
@CSweenz Even with a rewatch it still stressed and depressed in full.
The staff are singing wistfully to Wonderwall at the Raglan pub.
@jamescain92 besides, the anxiety it creates evokes the kind of year it's been. Love & Friendship next to counter.
Celebrating Xmas by showing folks Eye in the Sky. May not be particularly festive but it does feature Alan Rickman shopping 4 kids presents.
Don't get me wrong, my great aunts are lovely. But they are the definition of Great Aunts.
Sometimes when I'm listening to the intimate details of the lives of others I've never met, I get a little bored don't you know.
"We don't own other people's souls" -Aunty Cheryl
My parents love to live on the precarious brink of not knowing their wi-fi password.
@guywilliamsguy One step away from Candle Cove. https://t.co/Wmth9aPFZb
Businessmen in suits miming explosions near parliament hahahaha
Some days you're getting tipsy and making ratatouille, today's that day.
I sought Fantastic Beasts and subsequently Found Them charming if a touch overpacked. But they were in a small suitcase so that could be why

@NathanFillion IS ON LOST?!
(Entry 34 into 'James watches Lost for the first time')
@RNZdrama @frankieemms Congratulations! Thoroughly well deserved :)
@sihoward1 Oh wow. Where did you hear this?
@alikburns Atm I'm savoring all the Mr. Eko moments while I can.
@alikburns It's mainly to tide me over while I wait for Westworld eps, but that'll be a whole nother mystery show wormhole to disappear into
@alikburns Yay! Right in the middle of the second season, the golden years apparently. Where are you up to?
@jamescain92 omg he's such a jerk now he's tearing up the garden
@jamescain92 also stop pestering Sun about a baby Jin come on
OK so I know more about the French Woman now but what is Jin gunna do about Sun's mobster dad.
@jamescain92 Great improvement from yesterday's heartbreak re Selasi and the tent. That style... https://t.co/6I37X5e8c6
Spent day learning about Ethan's involvement in the Dharma Initiative, Josh Chan's love for West Covina and Kerry's moving into San Junipero
@davidfarrier Yesss fantastic news! Definitely doing double Amy Adams with Nocturnal Animals too
Hi Welly, Does anyone have a large video cam tripod that I can borrow for Monday?
Anyone want to come with me to this? @finni_yes @ryoffknighton @soundslikecin? https://t.co/eNvYLLjLgC
@ErinRBanks I've found the Playwright's Guidebook by Stuart Spencer really useful, very applicable to screenplays too.
@taylorhall_91 Miss you too! Ran into Binks&Cashy a couple months ago during Sheilah Winn, rocking it as ever. Hope season 2 is going well!
@taylorhall_91 I guess I should say draught but that ruins the gag
@taylorhall_91 Depends if you're drafting or crafting.
Radio magic at #RNZrotn evoking the dynamic clips and clops of a hypothetical horse. https://t.co/04KeRd9wBg
Eating at the Capital Market is like the final scene of the Last Crusade. Today I chose... poorly...
So Jane the Virgin pilot made me laugh in that 'I'm-about-to-tear-up-cause-this-so-good" kind of way, please tell me this quality continues.
Nothing like pulling the guts out of a rhino to make you want to get work done. Thanks Warehouse Stationary. https://t.co/GnwMneAEpR
@jamescain92 It's the poorest attempt to deepen my diction I've done so far. Guess words. Surprise learn.
Today my phone's been buzzing every two minutes! (which is the time delay for Solo Play on Words with Friends)
Fringers, plz see @AdamGoodallYes 's terrific show in the Studio @BATS_Theatre It's a joy and made me ok w liking Van Helsing again.
I joined the lottery to see LAZARUS at @NYTW79 for $25 on @TodayTix! Enter here: https://t.co/Z3cnE3gOfO #TTLazarus
Hamilton Airport's Hobbit Display. https://t.co/24hnSG2HPC
Only two more nights of witnessing Alan Rickman tread the @BATS_Theatre boards in Gift of the Gab. On tonight and tomorrow at 7:30pm.
Gift of the Gab opens tonight @BATS_Theatre, 7:30pm. We've all been working ridiculously hard and can't wait to show you what we've made!
Thanks to @NZStuff for the article about my impressions! Gift of the Gab opens tomorrow, 7:30pm at @BATS_Theatre https://t.co/SJPnkXiAaF
@lulamorashi I am sitting in IIML library, looked at the article, glanced over and saw the very book on the shelf.
@lulamorashi parent kept ordering him around by name. Eventually ordered him downstairs. Shame Noah.
@jamescain92 His grizzled Old Man and the Sea look trumps your namesake anyday.
On the ferry a kid called Noah pointed at my Dad and said "ew" GTFO Noah. That's my Dad.

I move to add potatoes to list of food adorations.
Am assessing leeks tonight, we shall see how they fare.

I LOVE mushrooms.
Think I didn't as a kid.
Idiot.
Everyone seen Young Doctor's Notebook? It's not only refreshingly bleak humour, Jon Hamm & Dan Rad being mates is wish fulfillment come true
@jamescain92 We're on a faux deep and meaningful night tonight. Complete with referencing to self as 'we'
Coax young you to speak up, start trying. Accept bridge between your taste and your talent. Make work you're proud of, die happy. ...right?
@alicemaaay I literally got sick the day after. Post show sickness rears its cruel head once again.
Just your daily reminder that Seneca the Younger's bust thinks it's hot shit. #tragiccurls http://t.co/uvrbX9QXK8
@fastercamels Yeah, Shattered floored me, it'll teach me to make snap judgements about actors, tho perhaps the credit goes to the casting.
@fastercamels Cheated w Google but Shattered Glass, High Fidelity and Adaptation are all relatively strong.
Going full Pete Campbell for Angelo in Measure for Measure. Starting on Tuesday, book at @BATS_Theatre http://t.co/Hgfd7unrgY
Kietel's pained whining is still the best in the business. Top 5 film whines?
Obviously I'd never play something that racy. But finding the 1 swear PG-13s is like panning for gold. You frequently question life choices.
At the video store I'd watch films during long shifts, subtitles on to quickly skip swears for customers. Bad Lieutenant would've been hell.
They've got Walkabout and Bad Lieutenant now on Netflix NZ? Man, let give me SOME time to do my work.
I tried to continue the iambic battle but I failed. Here's is a picture of @KeaganC , stoked at my surrender. http://t.co/XxyorWcNKp
@KeaganC @BATS_Theatre (please note, the contents of these insults in no way reflects the play's events) #measure4measure
@KeaganC @BATS_Theatre (2/2) For rank and offal stew will o'ersteep that thou shalt drown within both shit and swill. #measure4measure
@KeaganC @BATS_Theatre (1/2) though yet my barbs are bootless tide thy tongue Till thou has heard the torrent of my woes...
@KeaganC @BATS_Theatre The gauntlets thrown and so the war commence! With wicked word I'll drive thy hatred hence!
#Measure4Measure shows yonder @BATS_Theatre I'd whip up a storm of pentametered sell- But it's a tweet. Please come. http://t.co/vXVUmkCs57
@soundslikecin Oh I have no doubt. I am all over farming life with biblical overtones. Especially a GOAT ON HIS HIND LEGS. Terrifying.
@fastercamels oh cool, I'll have to check it out. The Changeling and Session 9 are also pretty worthwhile ghosties.
@fastercamels don't think so. Do you know what it's called? I've found one called legend of hell house which is around that time.
@fastercamels Innocents is really strong. Nice double bill w original Haunting.
@AdamGoodallYes CALL. HIS. NAME.
@fastercamels Berberian sound studio? The Innocents? Don't Look Now? Most stuff I assume you've already seen.
@AdamGoodallYes or the swamp of sadness if falkor is a pacifist.
@BenVereen Thank you so much for following me! Feeling very honoured and humbled right now, I'm a massive fan of your work!
A strange, cool twist this night has taken. http://t.co/elSm90zu7E
From now on a problematic thing is called a 'problo'. Coined. Please continue with your efficient lives.
@Flinnja @AdamGoodallYes The ride back from Good News tour did make me consider checking out more @KeshaRose. Seemed pretty damn fun.
@Flinnja @AdamGoodallYes http://t.co/TAI5BeShaD Have you two encountered this? Game where Ke$ha has magic powers.
Now onto Sly Stallone in First Blood. An actor who had relatively no bearing on my childhood so now I'm catching up. We'll see if worth it.
@FreyaDalySad @yourjokesarebad Fate. That we were meant to nostalgically reflect on a relatively trashy movie. (Fate's having an off night.)
@FreyaDalySad @yourjokesarebad https://t.co/SdOAcTL9Qc He worked his goofy dancing charm over all of us.
@FreyaDalySad @yourjokesarebad Woah, the talking gorilla named Ape was John Cleese. How did I not realize that?
@AdamGoodallYes @utherlives Come now, we both know he sacrificed himself so core cast could live 2 fight another day. Selflessness in action
@yourjokesarebad I should see that, George/Jungle and Bedazzled for me. I also remember renting Dudley Do-Right which was probably terrible.
@AdamGoodallYes @utherlives Manager was in secret society to defeat Mummy. Clearly the bookshelves would've played into it had they survived
@utherlives @AdamGoodallYes Domino bookshelves annoyed me so much though. Up your ladder game Weisz.
@utherlives Dalt Another Dalt
@utherlives Tomorrow Never Dalts.
@utherlives Having just recently shrugged off Bond Dalt
Although I can't comment on Penny Dreadful. The pilot made me irritable. Anyone stuck with it?
Proof all across the board, Lion in Winter - young Dalt, Hot Fuzz - older Dalt. Throw good or garbage at him, the Dalt keeps rolling on.
Whenever Timothy Dalton's having fun in a movie, I'm having fun in a movie.
@jamescain92 Although I don't recall a scrap of it so we'll see how it holds up.
